items.sentence: Tom is waiting for his new glasses to arrive.
Everyone was getting excited for the big day.
What's the most unusual pet you've ever seen?
You should get a doctor to take look at that.
We took the elevator down to the third floor.
The world could do with more people like Tom.
Tom's sobs could be heard from the next room.
Why are you so interested in what Tom thinks?
I just saved you about three hundred dollars.
Tom won't know we're here unless we tell him.
